task.title: Editing Tags
task.shortdesc: You can use the Tag Selector to edit and modify tags.

context.p: You may want to edit tags when deleting a tag from your library or when merging tags.

section.title: Renaming a Tag
section.p: You can rename a tag by clicking on the "Rename Tag" in the Tag Selector and typing the new name. By doing this, you change the tag name everywhere in your library.

section.title: Deleting a Tag
section.p: You can delete a single tag by clicking onthe minus “–” button.
If you want to delete a tag from your library entirely, right-click the tag and choose “Delete Tag”.

section.title: Merging Tags
section.p: You can merge a group of differently tagged items by replacing the current tag with the name of a different existing one. This will effectively delete the overwitten tag.
